Player Command
==============

See: `feelings <feelings.html>`_ `adverbs <adverbs.html>`_ `semote <semote.html>`_ 


USAGE
  |  ``random2``
  |  ``random2 <name>``

This command will randomly select a feeling to execute. This one might be slightly broke.
